item.description:
Off we go like Santa. Get your Lycomings ready, pre heat them, feed them 100LL and lets take to the skys.

We will check for Santa NOTAMS and TFRs of course...

 

 

The Nantucket Christmas Stroll will take place this year on December 2nd – 4th, 2011. If you've never been to an 'off season' event on Nantucket, this is one to attend. Hope for cold weather and a little snow to go along with a nice warm place to stay at night. Main Street is closed to vehicles on Saturday and there are many events going on.

 

This is one of the biggest events the FPA does, but it is for others as well. So, don't get left behind and watch your wake turbulence.

See ya on ACK!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Nantucket Christmas Stroll 2011 YEAHHHH
